scripts.firefox-copy: cp -r out firefox && mv firefox/static/firefox/manifest.json firefox/manifest.json
scripts.firefox-build: rm -rf firefox && npm run build && npm run export && npm run firefox-copy
scripts.chrome-copy: cp -r out chrome && mv chrome/static/chrome/manifest.json chrome/manifest.json
scripts.chrome-replace: mv chrome/_next chrome/next_ && find chrome -iname '*.html' -exec sd '/_next' '/next_' '{}' \; && find chrome -iname '*.js' -exec sd '/_next' '/next_' '{}' \;
scripts.chrome-build: rm -rf chrome && npm run build && npm run export && npm run chrome-copy && npm run chrome-replace
scripts.postinstall: cd packages/vtv && npm install && npm run build
